columns.business_id: The unique identifier for the associated business.
columns.user_id: The unique identifier for the reviewing user.
columns.rid: The unique identifier for each review entry.
columns.rating: The numerical rating given by the user.
columns.text: The written feedback provided by the user.
columns.year: The year when the review was submitted.
columns.month: The month when the review was submitted.

review.table_description: The table stores details of user reviews for businesses.

columns.tip_id: The unique identifier for each tip entry.
columns.business_id: The unique identifier for the associated business.
columns.text: The descriptive content of the tip.
columns.user_id: The unique identifier for the user providing the tip.
columns.likes: The number of likes received for the tip.
columns.year: The year when the tip was submitted.
columns.month: The month when the tip was submitted.

tip.table_description: The table stores user-provided tips about businesses.

columns.uid: The unique identifier for each user.
columns.user_id: The unique identifier used externally for the user.
columns.name: The name of the user.

user.table_description: The table stores information about users in the system.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each neighbourhood entry.
columns.business_id: The unique identifier for the associated business.

neighbourhood.table_description: The table stores neighbourhood information related to businesses.

columns.cid: The unique identifier for each check-in record.
columns.business_id: The unique identifier for the associated business.
columns.count: The total number of check-ins recorded for the business.
columns.day: The specific day when the check-in occurred.

checkin.table_description: The table records check-in data for businesses over time.

columns.bid: The unique identifier for each business record.
columns.business_id: The unique identifier for the business externally.
columns.name: The name of the business.
columns.full_address: The complete address of the business location.
columns.city: The city where the business is located.
columns.latitude: The latitude coordinate of the business.
columns.longitude: The longitude coordinate of the business.
columns.review_count: The total number of reviews for the business.
columns.is_open: Indicates whether the business is currently open.
columns.rating: The average rating given to the business.
columns.state: The state where the business operates.

business.table_description: The table holds essential information about businesses listed on Yelp.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each category record.
columns.business_id: The unique identifier for the associated business.
columns.category_name: The name of the category associated with the business.

category.table_description: The table stores category information for businesses listed on Yelp.
